title: [Large-scale] Online Nursing Education Course Design Utilizing Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning combining online lectures and interactive TV in digitally supported environments. Performance of case-based projects and provision of feedback to strengthen nursing practice competencies

learning_goals: Learners can apply nursing theories and practical skills with over 80% accuracy in a blended learning environment.
Learners can demonstrate clinical scenario analysis and problem-solving skills through project-based assessments.
Learners enhance real-time collaboration and discussion skills with peers and instructors using interactive TV and online platforms.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
